title: Microservices Architecture
subtext: Independent, small service modules in software
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Microservices Architecture
texts: Microservices architecture is a way of building software where each part is a small, independent piece. It's like building a Lego structure with different blocks that can be replaced without breaking the whole thing.
Think of microservices as separate apps on your phone that work together to make everything run smoothly.
